episode_summary: This episode covers a range of fascinating topics, including a music producer collaborating with bridges, the historical size of dragonflies, a fictional German politician, and the origins of the term 'powder room.'

facts.fact: Nate Mercerow, who produced the most recent album of Grammy-winning R&B star Leon Bridges, has now started collaborating with actual Bridges.
Dragonflies used to be the same size as modern-day pigeons.
Germany's parliament has 709 real politicians and one fictional one.
Before it was somewhere to go to powder your nose, a powder room was a room where you stuck your head through the wall to get your wig powdered.
